单细胞分析揭示了骨关节炎的关键软骨细胞亚群软骨细胞是软骨维持和修复必不可少的专门细胞，它们的功能障碍对于骨关节炎（OA）等关节疾病的发展至关重要。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250226/single-cell-analysis-reveals-key-key-ondonrocyte-subpopopopopopopopopopopoperasutions-sosteohrolthritis.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250226/single-cell-analysis-reveals-key-key-ondonrocyte-subpopopopopopopopopopulations in-osteoarhthritis.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=0A35C6C0-A908-4406-8CF8-5CF8-5ED0F1A70062 Wed, 26 Feb 2025 07:14:02 -0500 Single-cell analysis reveals key chondrocyte subpopulations in osteoarthritis

通过血液检查测量的器官衰老可能有助于预测与年龄有关的疾病我们的器官以不同的速度年龄，以及一项血液测试，确定他们每个年龄段的年龄可以预测诸如肺癌和心脏病之类的疾病的风险，这些疾病几十年后，发现了一项由伦敦大学学院（UCL）研究人员领导的一项新研究。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250226/organ-aging-measured-by-blood-test-may-help-predict-age-age-age-diseases.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250226/organ-aging-measured-by-blood-test-may-help-predict-age-age-age-diseases.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=cfd5fa14-b6a0-4b6c-9bea-66d8d9c80b17 Wed, 26 Feb 2025 06:12:50 -0500 Organ aging measured by blood test may help predict age-related diseases
运动改善慢性骨盆疼痛障碍的妇女的心理健康一项新的西奈山研究提供了令人信服的证据，表明运动可以显着帮助数百万慢性骨盆疼痛障碍（CPPD）的女性的心理健康，例如子宫内膜异位症和子宫肌瘤。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250226/cercise-improves-mental-well-beming-well-being--women-living-with-chronic-pelon-pelvic-pain-pain-disorders.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250226/cercise-improves-mental-well-beming-well-being-women-living-with-chronic-pelon-pelvic-pain-pain-disorders.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=b965fa8f-872a-47b4-47b4-8e93-34a68bbbccade Wed, 26 Feb 2025 06:08:08 -0500 Exercise improves mental well-being of women living with chronic pelvic pain disorders

球体流体将品牌重新品牌重新品尝到Sphere Bio Sphere Fluidics今天宣布将其品牌重新命名为Sphere Bio。这个名称更改标志着公司开发中的一个重要里程碑，反映了其从主要的基于液滴的微流体创新者到既定的综合生命科学工具和解决方案的商业提供商的过渡。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250226/sphere-fluidics-rebrands-rebrands-to-sphere-bio.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250226/sphere-fluidics-rebrands-rebrands-to-sphere-bio.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=56454E15-64E9-4B23-81FC-49765B9E11F5 Wed, 26 Feb 2025 04:38:00 -0500 Sphere Fluidics rebrands to Sphere Bio
